heroSection.title: Manage Your Library with Ease
heroSection.description: Our library management system helps you organize your books, track borrowings, and manage your library efficiently.

bookCatalog.title: Book Catalog
bookCatalog.description: Easily manage your book collection with our comprehensive catalog.

borrowingTracking.title: Borrowing Tracking
borrowingTracking.description: Keep track of who has borrowed what and when they need to return it.

inventoryManagement.title: Inventory Management
inventoryManagement.description: Maintain a clear overview of your library's inventory and stock levels.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay informed about due dates, overdue books, and other important updates.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Our system is designed to be user-friendly and accessible for all.

streamlineSection.title: Streamline Your Library Management
streamlineSection.description: Our library management system provides a comprehensive solution to help you organize, track, and optimize your library's operations.
